page.title: 10People Who Help Us,Stebbing
page.content: We Have a branch surgery in Stebbing on Mondays from 10_11am.It has been held in the United Reformed Church since the 1930's.The doctor carries his instruments and medicines with him.He makes lots of house calls as there is almost no puplic transport. The Policeman We have had our own police house and part time service in Stebbing since 1949.Road accidents and vandalism cause few problems as it is a low_abiding village. District Nurse There are two district nurses and an auxiliary attached to the surgery.They visit mothers with young babies,old people and people,who need a nurse and are too ill to go to the Surgery.
